messages.title: Competent Leadership or Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Benefits cap 'leads more into work'. Tax cuts for workers and savers. The deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, new businesses.

messages.title: Boosting our quality of life
messages.content: What is important to me is ensuring that we improve our market towns, Saffron Walden and Dunmow, and our villages from Hadstock in the north to Wittles in the south have an excellent standard of living.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sticking with the Government's long-term economic plan which will clear the deficit, lower taxes and improve public services.
Campaigning to accelerate the spread of high-speed broadband facilities so that all our towns and villages can be connected.
Giving young people a better opportunity to find work and make a home in the community in which they were born and brought up.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour is letting the Scottish tail wag the English dog, Vince Cable: Lib Dems could enter rainbow coalition with Labour and SNP.
mentions.partyLeader: Under David Cameron's leadership, we will hold a referendum on the EU

issues.brexitEurope: Under David Cameron's leadership, we will hold a referendum on the EU
issues.economy: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Spending up, more debt, higher taxes, jobs lost. Tax cuts for workers and savers. The deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, new businesses.
issues.education: All our local schools must provide an-all round education for students.
issues.health: Ambulance facilities are vital to achieve a high standard of care.
issues.immigration: I understand worries about immigration. Control will be tightened by negotiation within the European Union.

housing.content: Giving young people a better opportunity to find work and make a home in the community in which they were born and brought up.

leaflet.personalStatement: A strong and effective MP who will be accountable to you, vote Alan HASELHURST on 7th May

contactInformation.address: 12 Ash Green Great Chesterford Saffron Walden CB10 1QX

images.caption: Alan Haselhurst - A Strong voice for the Saffron Walden constituency.
Pressing for a railway fit for use in the 21st Century.
Securing our corner of rural Essex.
